root.name: Earl Weaver Baseball II
root.description: OverviewEarl Weaver Baseball II is a baseball game developed by Mirage Graphics and published by Electronic Arts for the PC platform.GameplayEarl Weaver Baseball II is like two baseball games in one. The first way to play the game is like a simulation style baseball game where the player can control the action going on in the game.The other way to play Earl Weaver Baseball II is a manager mode. This mode allows the player to manage a team using stats rather than action.
